website_summaries.verdict: A good upgrade from lightweight entry level tables, sized for the entire family. Assembly can take a while, but the finished product is stable and easily leveled.
pros: Table is very heavy, will not move during aggressive play
Rods spin freely but still hold horizontal positions
cons: Rods are a bit flimsy, and hard plastic handles may not fit properly
Playing surface is uneven, creating dead spots

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare on Christmas.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my children for Christmas. I thought they’d be really surprised because they love foosball. When I opened the package, I noticed immediately that there were a few items that were scratched or damaged. I thought I could overlook these things because it weighed a ton and I didn’t want to disappoint my children. But as I got towards the end of building it, (which was no easy task) I realized that this thing was basically ready for a landfill! It was really poorly made and flimsy. The laminated pieces were coming apart. The plastic footing for the legs were broken. The holes weren’t machined precisely. In short, I really regret the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: Mold! Really...
customer_reviews.text: This foosball table showed up with mold covering half of the underside of the playing field surface. Very disappointed as our boys just opened it this Christmas morning and were devastated. Very disappointed. And it is completely warped!
customer_reviews.author: Qwerty

customer_reviews.title: Watch out mold on first one. Second had no problems.
customer_reviews.text: Box was damaged and has black mold. Horrible! Follow up 2 weeks later: Received the replacement table and box and content were in perfect condition. Only giving 4 stars because original was damaged and returning it was a hassle. I put it together with my 6 year old son in less than two hours. Instructions are really good and if you follow them you will not have a problem. Have to say it is a great table for the price and my son loves it. Well actually we both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel M Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great value, durable product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a decently built one considering the very reasonable price. It took 3-person team 2hour, so I won't say it's easy to assemble, while think about the nature of the Foosball deck, I think it's reasonable. Definitely you want to have good tool like electric screwdriver to save time and effort for assembling. This especially will give a lot of family fun and bonding time!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy product and works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a roomful of older teenagers and they love it. The pieces, while your standard manufactured wood, are very sturdy and the "players" and rods are very solid. Even the set of balls that came with the set are of a high quality. The table plays great, with only a handful of times of the ball rolling to a stop outside the reach of any of the "players". Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Haskins

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised! I read many reviews about the nightmare of assembly, missing and ill-fitting parts but ours was great. Missing one small piece..a bumper type object that belongs on the metal playing rods..but we are fine without it. Ours came with four balls. The instructions for assembly were clear and while it took some time, it wasn't difficult. I hope this lasts. Seems sturdy enough for the price. Update 8/30/2016 - while the kids don't play it as often as I'd hoped, it's still in great shape and seems to be sturdy. We have moved it around the room a few times as we change the furniture layout and it's been fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Good value !
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during Black Friday. Good value for the price. Play with my 6-year old for hours. Outside structure is not the most high quality of materials but the little players and field of play is sturdy- hours of fun and guests love it as well. Would be 5 stars but some of the particle board deteriorates if you hit it in the wrong place. Paying $200 for this vs. $2,000 for higher quality tables is definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Cacahuete

customer_reviews.title: Table good, service stinks
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, the playing surface was damaged. I decided to assemble it with the board upside down, which doesn't look great but plays fine. What's annoying is that the so-called customer service never even bothered replying to us. You might want to go to the store for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Tobin

customer_reviews.title: Works great -- imperfect finish dealt with promptly by customer service
customer_reviews.text: Pretty big assembly project. Not perfect fit-and-finish. In fact two of the legs had peeled and delaminated. But, the company was really responsive about sending out new ones that are fine. Table works great. Son and grandchildren enjoy it when they visit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So can not recommend this product avoid
customer_reviews.text: Product gets 4 stars for quality of materials but is a 1 star since it is missing parts the playfield supports which turn out to be critical. So can not recommend this product avoid! Update: Spoke to product support and they will be shipping out the parts. So once assembled I will update the review with the final product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Garlick

customer_reviews.title: So far it has held up great. The first few weeks it was played every ...
customer_reviews.text: Received the table exactly when they said it would. Took the husband a little while to put it together. So far it has held up great. The first few weeks it was played every day. Our 7 year old grandson all the way up to his 30 something mother and uncles can play. Everyone seems to enjoy it.So glad it has the ability to level the table since we have carpet where we put it. Overall, I'd say this was a good buy for our family.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall - good price to quality ratio !
customer_reviews.text: Clear instructions, no missing parts - took me slightly over 3 hrs to assemble, could have been faster with more than person. Great quality for the value yet the quality of the plastic handles could be better. Instead of liquid soap, I used WD-40 as lubricant for the handles, made it extremely easy to complete the task. Overall - good price to quality ratio !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Took my son and I two hours to put together. Table is sturdy, only one of the screw holes needed to be "fixed" by moving the plastic retainer to the right hole. Legs can be removed relatively easily to move (it is too wide for most doorways with out leg removal).
customer_reviews.author: Brustkern

customer_reviews.title: Excellent STURDY entry level table.  Well done!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great table for the money (especially when you find it on Amazon Cyber Monday about 50% off). I think it’s really sturdy for the price point, even if the foosball guys are really plain. I’m more worried about the sturdiness and standing up to teenagers playing intensely vs detailed foosball guys. Easy to put together but took hours and hours to do so. I highly recommend a magnetic screwdriver. There are a couple of real tight spots. Overall very pleased. Again very sturdy table for an entry level budget.
customer_reviews.author: john zuckett

customer_reviews.title: Great game table for  the money
customer_reviews.text: My husband assembled in a couple of hours, it appears my daughter and her husband enjoy it more than my grands. The table looks like a more expensive one and so glad I purchased very sturdy. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or your money
customer_reviews.text: I would leave less than one star if it was possible. I couldn't even get the thing put together before it began to fall apart. The body of the table is constructed from materials that I am not sure could even be considered wood. This material is as much "wood" as Taco Bell meat is "beef". The wood breaks apart simply by inserting the screws that came with the package. Don't waste your time or your money.
customer_reviews.author: D. McTeer

customer_reviews.title: Great table for beginners and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.text: The foosball table looks great but there are a lot of dead zones where neither player can reach the ball. I think the plastic players should be 1/8" longer or the field about 2"-3" shorter. Great table for beginners. The price is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Al Villamar

customer_reviews.title: Solid table for price
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were easy to follow for assembly, and two people had it together in a few hours. The table is particle board construction, but feels and looks like a solid table. Its a nice size and weight. There are a few dead spots for slow players.
customer_reviews.author: Midlifemom

customer_reviews.title: Good solid quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons for Christmas and it’s a big hit. My son put it together and said it was tedious but well worth it. It’s very good solid quality and operates very well. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kkmcc

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a Christmas gift for my hubs. We have a 4 &6 year old kids and they love playing with us. It’s don’t very fancy but it does the job for a very good price. He assembled it in a couple of hours. Over all very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MRoberts

customer_reviews.title: Great table. My son 9 years old got it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great table. My son 9 years old got it for Christmas and loves it! I researched a lot of tables cause I wanted to make sure I got a sturdy and strong table for a reasonable price. This table is exactly that and it withstands the adults playing on it. Takes a while to put together cause it has a lot of screws so we did it over a couple of days. Very happy with purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice table for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice table for the price. The instructions are very well detailed. Takes about three hours to assemble, and as just mentioned, if you follow the steps your assembly will work out just fine. My family enjoys this product.
customer_reviews.author: Party of Five

customer_reviews.title: Definately recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great product, kids love it. Instructions and the labeling of all the parts was among the best I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great value for first Foosball table
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in good condition. Assembly wasn't as difficult as I feared. Took maybe two or three hours stretched over a few evenings of tinkering. It's a good value and fun table. Maybe not perfect for the hardcore foosballers. But it's perfect for my first table as part a basement refurbishment from "kid play area" to "teen hang out". I added plastic fold-up cup holders. I also added LED lights. It was pretty easy to do. Great effect.
customer_reviews.author: L. Thundergrass

customer_reviews.title: Family fun
customer_reviews.text: Decent for a teen but wouldn’t hold up to super frequent or rough use
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O

customer_reviews.title: Way too many parts.
customer_reviews.text: This table comes in so many pieces, it’s iver whelming. The directions say you need 4 more men for parts of it. It takes a brain scientist to put to together. We didn’t try. Too bothersome. .
customer_reviews.author: Dustybunny

customer_reviews.title: Fun but toxic smelling
customer_reviews.text: The table quality is adequate but the smell is toxic. It's been two months and our game room still smells. We run a fan, air purifier and keep the windows opened. Thinking about disposing it since we want to get back into our game room. Disappointed because we have been having fun.
customer_reviews.author: RChin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for a basement rec room
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for a basement rec room! We love it. It looks great. Wasn't terrible to put together but you need a few people to turn it over after the legs are on. This thing is HEAVY. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT VERY HAPPY WITH THIS TABLE.
customer_reviews.text: The table seems to built decent for the price, however the rods are very cheap. The bushings are very loose, sloppy actually. I would not have bought the table had I known this. Also, the handles that come with it are very cheap. They're a very hard plastic that will not fit the rod completely, even with using soap to put them on as the manual suggested. So you end of with lopsided handles, which makes it difficult to play properly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: WOW!!! I can’t believe the quality of this table for the price!!! It is very solid and sturdy! It looks very expensive! We are very pleased with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but working fine for the kids
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit light, but working fine for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: JBeldon

customer_reviews.title: Great table, once I got it assembled
customer_reviews.text: Love the table, plays great, very sturdy. If I had to complain it was a tedious job putting it together definiately would have requested to assembly option.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon S

customer_reviews.title: great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: Took about 2 hours to put together and so far has held up well. Very happy for the price, looks and plays great.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great product. High quality Foosball table
customer_reviews.text: Great product. High quality Foosball table. Nice, heavy duty construction.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Evans

customer_reviews.title: Good quality table for fun. May not be suitable for serious player.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality overall, not too difficult to assemble. Was not able to get the playing surface is not completely flat though, so ball is moving around in weird lines at times. It's ok for my kids, they don't even notice, but someone looking for more serious play with ball control will find it annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Eric.F

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Better quality then I expected for the price. Well made and withstands the rigor and rough play of myself as well my 11 and 10 year old boys.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: A super replacement if your are tired of your kids being on computers and not engaging with other people!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it a 5 star because of how much the kids love the game. I give it a 3 Star because it took a good handyman 3 hours to put together. Their friends love the game and so does the family. Great holiday give. Not cheap feeling. Seems sturdy and stable. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: timbo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Guys are playing this daily in my shop, takes a ton of use and has held up well
customer_reviews.author: Victorcan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of our son’s favorite Christmas gifts. Was a task getting it set up. Once we figured it out, assembly was easy. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Not the highest quality table I’ve seen but a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry H.

customer_reviews.title: sons and all their cousins loved it this holiday
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to assemble but very worth it. My husband, sons and all their cousins loved it this holiday. Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money
customer_reviews.text: Best value for money ! Great memories maker for families.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Virginia Ramon

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect parts received
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased an Atomic Pro Force Table. The (yellow) defenders rod has 3 players as opposed to 2 which conflicts with the (black) defenders which came with 2 defenders (which seems to be correct).
customer_reviews.author: jfm

customer_reviews.title: My family loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My family laughed so hard while playing this which showed me they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Sedillo

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome table. Took a lot to setup though. Not complicated just took more steps than I would have like.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Get what ya paid for
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy assembly, just wish it was a little heavier for less movement while playing
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived before expected and table plays perfect. Excellent seller and excellent price. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: once in a while

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy table that looks like it will last.
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to put together although it took a while to do. Seems quite sturdy and is great for adults too.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Postance

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift and the Product was damaged!!
customer_reviews.author: justtruth

customer_reviews.title: great table for the price
customer_reviews.text: I could tell by the condition of the box that it had a rough trip to my location. Thankfully it was well packaged and nothing was damaged. Assembly instructions were easy to follow and I had it togather in under 3 hours. You should have 0 extra parts. A long phillips head screwdriver comes in handy. Be careful not to strip the pre set holes. Once assembled the table is sturdy and plays well. The rubber handles are not very tight on the rods but I added a thin wrap of tape to the rod and problem solved. Other than the black players matching the black field, I have no complaints and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: ben

customer_reviews.title: Good basic table.
customer_reviews.text: Good basic table. Plays well though we've had a few dead spots just behind the center rows of players. Set up took about 3-4 hours but would have been much faster with an electric screw driver. Be absolutely sure to pay attention to the placement of the rods of players at the beginning of the assembly, especially note that the holes at the end of each handle need to all be on the same side for each color (all the whites on one side, all the backs in the other). Rubber handles are comfortable to grip. Solid feel overall. We're happy given the low cost.
customer_reviews.author: imref

customer_reviews.title: My grandson's love it. The company could use a bit longer ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson's love it. The company could use a bit longer screws for some parts, example the feet of the legs, and use metal stabilizer bars instead of plastic...but all in all it was a winner.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: A nice sturdy & stable game table
customer_reviews.text: A nice sturdy & stable game table. Looks sharp. And if my husband could assemble it in a couple hours, anyone can!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No surprise there, exactly what I thought it should be
customer_reviews.author: Catherine N. Delcroix

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Two of the 4 table-legs arrived damaged. Table composed of low-quality, irregular materials.
customer_reviews.author: ACK

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for price
customer_reviews.text: Great Product for price. Very Sturdy and easy to assemble, ~2 hours. Would give it a higher rating but no product is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Avetik Karapetyan

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRICE.  VERY HAPPY WITH IT.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. Got it on sale which made it even better. Lots of fun so far. ps- once assembled, my husband realized HE forgot to put the BUMPERS on the rods BEFORE assembly and also some RODS WERE IN BACKWARDS. Did not realize the small hole at the end of the rods went on the same side. He ended up taking the men off the rods and redoing them, better than removing the legs and disassembling.
customer_reviews.author: Fonzie Tilley

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with all parts and in great condition
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this table. It's sturdy and looks goid
customer_reviews.author: Judy K. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Sturdiness can be improved. Great foos ball table but also a little on the expensive side
customer_reviews.author: F. Tech

product_meta.title: Atomic Pro Force 56" Foosball Table with Internal Ball Return and Ball Entry, Leg Levelers, and Heavy-Duty Legs
product_meta.description: A foosball table doesn't have to mean bright colors and flashing lights. The Atomic Pro Force 56 in. Foosball Table keeps it simple for a stylish looking game that would fit right into the professional office environment or the game room of your home. This durable MDF table features rich bamboo laminate, a manual scoring system, built-in ball return, and hollow chrome steel rods with comfortable rubber handles. This table doesn't simply look great, it plays great. The Pro Force measures 56" L x 29.5" W x 34.5" H and comes with four balls. This modern foosball table comes with robot-style players and hollow chrome steel rods and rubber octagonal handles. The table features engineered wood with stylish bamboo laminate and manual slide scoring system.
feature_bullets: High Quality Foosball Table For Active Play
Internal Ball Return and Ball Entry
3.5" Leg Levelers for Even Playing Field
Heavy Duty Legs and Steel Parts
